name: KAILASA ANALYTICS AND SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Technology is penetrating our lives deeper everyday with products, services & solutions available in few  clicks. Therefore, on one hand we have physical stores and e-commerce portals to supply goods and on  the other hand we have online exchange portals to facilitate exchange of used but usable goods. But  there’s no solution available to channelize what is end of life (waste). 
This is where Reverse E-Commerce Private Limited sees a huge opportunity. We aim to use technology to  channelize waste to its righteous destination and in this endeavor; Reverse E-Commerce Private Limited  has created its online portal named Waste Bazar.
name: REVERSE E-COMMERCE PRIVATE LIMITED
GAIA SMART CITIES SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
MILJON MEDI APP LLP has identified an opportunity in the Pharmaceutical sector which involves connecting the key players through a mobile app called medi-app – namely:
• Pharma Companies,
• Stockists/Distributors
• Retail Chemists,
Medi-App is a digital B2B platform. This space is practically vacant now as there is no player who covers all these key elements on a single platform.
Miljon has planned a Rs 1200 crore turnover, with 400000 Retail Chemists, 25 Pharma Companies in a 5 year period.
Medi-app will be able to generate revenue from the following:
1. Commission/Profit on sales that takes place through medi-app
2. Advertisement revenue from Pharma Companies
3. Market audit reports on product sales and Drs prescription habits
4. Patient health/disease pattern reports & wellness reports
Medi-app was launched commercially among Retail Chemists on 18th Aug 2017 in 9 States with products of One Pharma company onboard. The highlights are as follows:
Period 18.8.17 to 10.02.18 %
No of Chemists downloaded medi-app 7378
Users (who placed orders) 6337 86%
Repeat Users 2545 48%
Within a short span of 5 months medi-app has proven that users are placing orders on it, thus generating revenue. We have achieved a billing of Rs 148 Lakhs during this period. Medi-app is a scalable model which will break even in the 3rd year.
MILJON has been founded by professionals well experienced in the Pharma, Logistics, Finance & IT fields.
The Funding Required is for Rs 25 cr, which will be used to meet expenses of acquiring Customers, Expansion of manpower and up-gradation of app to handle larger numbers of transactions and customers.
name: Miljon Medi App LLP
